Genre: Crime, Drama, Thriller

Plot: A Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien (Sean Penn) has been sent to a juvenile prison for vehicular manslaughter. Most unfortunately, the person he kills is the kid brother of his nemesis Paco Moreno (Esai Morales), who vows revenge 
by raping Mick's girlfriend. Paco is caught and sent to the same prison where he re-works his revenge plan, and Mick has no choice but to defend himself.

Starring: Sean Penn, Easi Morales, Ally Sheedy, Reni Santoni, Jim Moody, Eric Gurry and others.
